title: Diamond Ore
desc:
Post 796
- When stood on, you can play any card as a <:wild:1106237191388143838>.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 1 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card cannot be drawn, and is instead created when a 788 is played before a <:wild:1106237191388143838> card.
